cz.ive.manager
Class QTQuery

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.messaging.SyncHook
      cz.ive.manager.QueryTrigger
          cz.ive.manager.QTQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hook, Listener, java.io.Serializable
public class QTQuery
extends QueryTrigger
implements Listener

Box of passive query. Stores query expression, evaluate it continuously and notify listeners about changes in the set of query passing objects.

Author:
Jirka
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

QTQuery

public QTQuery(ManagerOfSenses man,
               java.util.List<Sensor> sens,
               java.util.Set<IveObject> input,
               QueryData d,
               Substitution srcs,
               ManagerOfSenses.ReturnSet f)
Creates new trigger to manage passive updates.

Parameters:
man - refernece to the Manager of Senses
sens - list of sensors
input - IveObject to be passed to procession of expression
d - data of the query including expression
srcs - substituted variables
f - specifies how will be objects returned

alterInput

void alterInput(java.util.Set<IveObject> input)
Removes or adds objects in expression to reach the given state. Makes intelligent diff. Consideres only object with appropriate role

Parameters:
input - Objects that will be in the input after that call
